name: Frog's light (TrizG)
description:
Froggy gets lost in the shadow wood, unfortunately, the wood fills with hostile animals that always try to eat him, luckily only thing they fear is light! Eat those fireflies to make Froggy glow and get those animals away from Froggy! Feature
  •  Froggy game
  • Grid-based puzzle
  • handcrafted 23 levels
  • F R O G
  • Dating frog feature
Controls
  • WASD to move Froggy/his tongue around
  • Space to activate tongue
Eat all the flies before the light runs out to win the level!

Game based on Frog's light jam version from Minijam 106

Twitter @trizG_ Youtube TrizG_
